Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 8 Nīvaraṇagocchaka » 8.3 Nīvaraṇasampayuttaduka » 8.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 8.3.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 8.3.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Nīvaraṇagocchaka
Nīvaraṇasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
86.
2073Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha…pe…  namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
2074Paccanīyaṃ.
